actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Trails West National Historical Park in the States of Nebraska and Wyoming.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands and interests in specified areas of Nebraska and to establish the Trails West National Historical Park in Nebraska and Wyoming once sufficient lands have been acquired. Creates a Trails West National Historical Park Advisory Commission.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Trails West National Historical Park in the States of Nebraska and Wyoming.
